body_content.explanation: the act of writing your name on a document to show that you agree with it or accept it:
an occasion when a famous person writes his or her name on something and gives it to someone :
examples: Later ,there will be a poetry reading and book signing for his new volume of poems.
She was invited to autograph signings around the country.

body_content.explanation: in sport, a player who has signed a legal agreement to play for a team:
examples: The club's summer signings will take time to settle in.

body_content.explanation: the act of using sign language (= hand movements representing words, used by and to people who cannot hear or talk)
